name: removeUserFromGroup
description:
Removes a user from a group.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** Site administration (that is, member of the *site-admin* [group](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/24xjL)).

groupname.description:
As a group's name can change, use of `groupId` is recommended to identify a group.  
The name of the group. This parameter cannot be used with the `groupId` parameter.

groupId.description: The ID of the group. This parameter cannot be used with the `groupName` parameter.

username.description: This parameter is no longer available. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

accountId.description: The account ID of the user, which uniquely identifies the user across all Atlassian products. For example, *5b10ac8d82e05b22cc7d4ef5*.
